name: Flash Flood
description:
Just a quick and effortless game for the Low Effort Jam 8.

Update: This placed #1 in the jam :)

Controls:

  • Move = Left thumb stick on gamepad, AD or Left/Right arrows on keyboard.
  • Jump = Fire on gamepad, left mouse button or CTRL on keyboard.

Can you escape the rising water and reach the top? :)

Everything was effortlessly made by myself during a couple of effort free hours. I almost spent more time setting up this game page than the game itself.
